chat.content:
============================
forall a b : Z, a <> 0 -> b <> 0 -> distinct_parity a b -> Z.add a b < Z.add (Z.mul a a) (Z.mul b b)

Related definitions and lemmas:
distinct_parity = fun a b : Z => Zeven a /\ Zodd b \/ Zodd a /\ Zeven b : Z -> Z -> Prop Arguments distinct_parity (_ _)%Z_scope
Inductive Z : Set := Z0 : Z | Zpos : positive -> Z | Zneg : positive -> Z Arguments Zpos _%positive_scope Arguments Zneg _%positive_scope
Z.rem_opp_l : forall a b : Z, b <> 0 -> Z.rem (- a) b = - Z.rem a b
Z.rem_opp_r : forall a b : Z, b <> 0 -> Z.rem a (- b) = Z.rem a b
Z.pow_nonzero : forall a b : Z, a <> 0 -> 0 <= b -> a ^ b <> 0
Z.quot_rem : forall a b : Z, b <> 0 -> a = b * (a Ã· b) + Z.rem a b
Z.div_mod : forall a b : Z, b <> 0 -> a = b * (a / b) + a mod b
sqr_sum : forall a b : Z, b <> 0 -> a * a + b * b <> 0
Z.log2_lxor : forall a b : Z, 0 <= a -> 0 <= b -> Z.log2 (Z.lxor a b) <= Z.max (Z.log2 a) (Z.log2 b)
Z.mod_mul_r : forall a b c : Z, b <> 0 -> c <> 0 -> Z.rem a (b * c) = Z.rem a b + b * Z.rem (a Ã· b) c
Z.rem_mul_r : forall a b c : Z, b <> 0 -> 0 < c -> a mod (b * c) = a mod b + b * ((a / b) mod c)
Z.mod_bound_or : forall a b : Z, b <> 0 -> 0 <= a mod b < b \/ b < a mod b <= 0
Z.quot_quot : forall a b c : Z, b <> 0 -> c <> 0 -> a Ã· b Ã· c = a Ã· (b * c)
Z.div_div : forall a b c : Z, b <> 0 -> 0 < c -> a / b / c = a / (b * c)
Z.log2_same : forall a b : Z, 0 < a -> 0 < b -> Z.log2 a = Z.log2 b -> a < 2 * b
Z.log2_up_same : forall a b : Z, 0 < a -> 0 < b -> Z.log2_up a = Z.log2_up b -> a < 2 * b
Z.add_log2_lt : forall a b : Z, 0 < a -> 0 < b -> Z.log2 a + Z.log2 b < 2 * Z.log2 (a + b)
Z.add_log2_up_lt : forall a b : Z, 0 < a -> 0 < b -> Z.log2_up a + Z.log2_up b < 2 * Z.log2_up (a + b)
Z.div_eucl_eq : forall a b : Z, b <> 0 -> let (q, r) := Z.div_eucl a b in a = b * q + r
Z_div_plus_full_l : forall a b c : Z, b <> 0 -> (a * b + c) / b = a + c / b
Z.div_add_l : forall a b c : Z, b <> 0 -> (a * b + c) / b = a + c / b
Z.pow_pos_nonneg : forall a b : Z, 0 < a -> 0 <= b -> 0 < a ^ b
Z_div_mod_full : forall a b : Z, b <> 0 -> let (q, r) := Z.div_eucl a b in a = b * q + r /\ Remainder r b
Z.quot_add : forall a b c : Z, c <> 0 -> 0 <= (a + b * c) * a -> (a + b * c) Ã· c = a Ã· c + b
Z.add_nocarry_lxor : forall a b : Z, Z.land a b = 0 -> a + b = Z.lxor a b
Z.quot_add_l : forall a b c : Z, b <> 0 -> 0 <= (a * b + c) * c -> (a * b + c) Ã· b = a + c Ã· b
Z.log2_lt_pow2 : forall a b : Z, 0 < a -> a < 2 ^ b < -> Z.log2 a < b
Z.mod_pos_bound : forall a b : Z, 0 < b -> 0 <= a mod b < b
Z.mod_neg_bound : forall a b : Z, b < 0 -> b < a mod b <= 0
Z.rem_add : forall a b c : Z, c <> 0 -> 0 <= (a + b * c) * a -> Z.rem (a + b * c) c = Z.rem a c
Z.div_add : forall a b c : Z, c <> 0 -> (a + b * c) / c = a / c + b
Z_div_plus_full : forall a b c : Z, c <> 0 -> (a + b * c) / c = a / c + b

```intros a b H1 H2 H3. unfold distinct_parity in H3. destruct H3 as [[H4 H5] | [H6 H7]].
- apply Z.lt_le_incl. rewrite Z.add_comm. apply Z.lt_trans with (m := a * a + b) (p := b * b + a). 
  + rewrite Z.add_comm. apply Z.mul_lt_mono_pos_r.
    * apply Z.sqr_sum. apply H2.
    * apply Z.lt_le_incl in H4. apply H4.
  + rewrite <- Z.add_comm. apply Z.lt_le_incl. apply Z.mul_le_mono_nonneg_l.
    * apply Z.lt_le_incl in H5. apply H5.
    * apply Z.rem_mul_r.
      { apply H2. }
      { apply Z.pow_nonzero. apply H1. apply Z.le_0_1. }
- apply Z.lt_le_incl. rewrite Z.add_comm. apply Z.lt_trans with (m := a * a + b) (p := b * b + a). 
  + rewrite Z.add_comm. apply Z.mul_lt_mono_pos_r.
    * apply Z.sqr_sum. apply H2.
    * apply Z.lt_le_incl in H6. apply H6.
  + rewrite <- Z.add_comm. apply Z.lt_le_incl. apply Z.mul_le_mono_nonneg_l.
    * apply Z.lt_le_incl in H7. apply H7.
    * apply Z.rem_mul_r.
      { apply H2. }
      { apply Z.pow_nonzero. apply H1. apply Z.le_0_1. }```
